text: Its  should ve  and NOT  should of  Holy fucking shit  I can t stand it anymore  A few months ago  I saw someone type  should ve  as  should of  on their Instagram story and couldn t stop laughing at that  It was hilariously stupid  Fast forward to current time  SO MANY PEOPLE ARE MAKING THE SAME MISTAKE  Like how the fuck did that shit spread faster than corona  Today I saw a trending post on this sub Reddit which also made the same mistake  After reading that  I knew I had to do something to save the world from this abomination and what better way than to start from us  the teenagers  We are gonna be the ones to lead the future  so we cannot be making such silly mistakes   So let me make it clear Should have  is shortened to  Should ve   That s it   There s nothing like  Should of  This no makes sense   So I request you all to stop making the same mistake and if you see anyone else do the same  please correct them as well   I hope that at least on this sub Reddit  I won t see anymore  should of s in people s posts  I know there might be grammatical errors in this post as well but I hope my message is clear  Godspeed
summary: There is a trend on Reddit where people are using the wrong spelling of the word "Should" instead of "Should of". This is a problem for teenagers. They are going to be the ones to lead the future so they can't be making such silly mistakes.
cleaned: trend geddit people wrong spelling word instead problem teenager go one lead future not make silly mistake
